original_title: Nalinda Jayatissa appointed Chief Govt Whip
original_body_lines: Minister of Health and Media Dr. Nalinda Jayatissa has been appointed as the Chief Government Whip of the new government, during the inaugural Cabinet meeting held today (19).
The inaugural Cabinet meeting of the new government was held today at the Presidential Secretariat, chaired by President Anura Kumara Dissanayake.
